system.description: The user's attacks are unaffected by the abilities of other creatures on the field. When using Fusion Bolt, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to also inflict Nullified 5 on one of the target's abilities. If the user uses Bolt Strike, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to inflict Nullified 5 on one of the target's abilities as well as inflicting Blinded 5.
